snippet: Questions remain about what happened when one powerful Chinese official told another that his wife was a suspect in the death of a British citizen.
abstract: Questions remain about what happened when Chinese official Wang Lijun told Bo Xilai that his wife Gu Kailai was a suspect in the death of British businessman Neil Heywood; in the murky, rumor-filled world surrounding Bo’s downfall, it is unclear exactly where the truth lies in the different accounts of the final meeting between the two men.

byline.contributor: Shi Da contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Questions remain about what happened when one powerful Chinese official told another that his wife was a suspect in the death of a British citizen.

headline.seo: New Account of Bo Xilai Meeting With Wang Lijun
headline.main: In Chinese Murder Mystery, Take 2 for Big Scene
headline.print_headline: In Chinese Murder Mystery, Take 2 for Big Scene
